Class AddItemView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory.AddItemView

  • public class AddItemView
extends java.lang.Object
    View which displays an interface to add an Item to a User's Inventory.

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                Intent data)
        Upon return from the gallery or the camera, we get the bitmap returned and add it to the item's photoGallery model via the ItemPhotoController; this will ensure the photo gets sized correctly Code used: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27874038/how-to-make-intent-chooser-for-camera-or-gallery-application-in-android-like-wha
        Parameters:
        requestCode - We set this when launching the intent to determine how to handle its return
        resultCode - if the intent returned with what we want, this will be RESULT_OK
        data - optional data returned by the activity

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath(Uri uri,
                                Activity activity)
        Used to get the path of the file selected in the gallery selector. This is called in the onActivityResult handler. Code used: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27874038/how-to-make-intent-chooser-for-camera-or-gallery-application-in-android-like-wha
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri returned by the gallery intent
        activity - this activity
        Returns:
